products.name: Conversion Kit
products.description: Made of nylon tire & alloy rim & stainless steel spoke that is super durable. Easy ride, refitted electric power, up to 100 kilometers duration. Powerful brushless gearless hub motor. Twist throttle has battery level and power-cut off. Perfect tool set that is  useful, helpful and so practical.
